◆ IS_FLASH_PROGRAM_ADDRESS

#define IS_FLASH_PROGRAM_ADDRESS (   __VALUE__)
Value:
(((__VALUE__) >= FLASH_BASE) && ((__VALUE__) <= (FLASH_BASE + FLASH_SIZE - 8UL)) && \
(((__VALUE__) % 8UL) == 0UL))
